org.eclipse.viatra.integration.mwe2.mwe2impl

Class WhileLoop

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.viatra.integration.mwe2.mwe2impl.Sequence
      • org.eclipse.viatra.integration.mwe2.mwe2impl.WhileLoop
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICompositeStep, ITransformationStep
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoWhileLoop

    public class WhileLoop
extends Sequence
    Composite transformation step that implements a 'while' style loop. similar to the conditional step, the dynamically evaluated loop condition is provided by an IConditionProvider.
